b_visa_official bv JOIN b_service_order so ON bv.service_order_id = so.id JOIN tb_user tu ON bv.user_id = tu.id JOIN b_applicant ba ON so.applicant_id = ba.id left JOIN b_receive_type brt ON brt.id = so.receive_type_id join tb_adviser ta on ta.id = bv.adviser_id left join b_refund br on br.commission_order_id = bv.id join b_official bo on bo.id = bv.official_id left join b_official_grade bog on bog.id = bo.grade_id left join b_service bs on bs.id = so.service_id where bv.id = #{id}
